short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves and restores tab sessions. Save,auto save, manage current tabs/open windows session. Lite & simple to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension solves problem of lost tabs history or session. It stores and reload your chrome windows session with time, date and session groups. 

You can store as many different sessions for different purposes, and later as per need restore those tabs/session. 

Auto save your session in case you forgot to manually save session, your last session always there. If you want to save last session for later use, you can restore and save it manually with different name.

Allows manage sessions custom naming, renaming, deleting. Light weight and simple usage.
